About

Hey there! I’m Ash, a passionate and versatile professional with expertise in web development, data science, machine learning, graphic design, and embedded systems. I love creating innovative digital solutions that make a difference.

My Skills

Languages: Python, C, C++, Javascript, SQL, Latex
Frameworks: Django, Flask, FastAPI, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, Selenium
Tools: Git/Github, Linux, Vim, Emacs, Excel, Redis, BeautifulSoup, MongoDB
Libraries: Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Sci-kit learn, Celery, Django Channels
Domains: Web Development, Data Science, Machine Learning, Graphic Design, Embedded Systems

My Approach and Workflow

In my work, I focus on delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions that not only meet business objectives but also enhance user experience. I begin each project by thoroughly understanding the client's needs, followed by careful planning and research to ensure a strategic approach. My workflow combines creativity with technical expertise, leveraging the latest tools and frameworks to build efficient, scalable solutions. I believe in iterative development and continuous improvement, always open to feedback and keen to adapt to new challenges. With clear communication and a collaborative mindset, I ensure that every project is tailored to deliver the best possible outcome.
